info.awakeneditems.awakening: Any item can be awakened by dropping it on an anvil and then using soulstuff on the anvil.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_xp.any_t1.an: Before I can advance further, we need to travel to the nether.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_xp.any_t2.an: Before I can advance further, we need to travel to the end.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_requirements: Now I can be reforged into something greater.
Now I can be reforged again into something even greater.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_reached.any_: Through my reforging I have reached level %s!
Through my second reforging I have reached level %s!
Before I can advance further, you need to survive an attack so powerful it would usually kill you instantly, while wearing me.
Before I can advance further, you need to survive an attack so powerful it would usually kill you twice over, while wearing me.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_requirements: Now I can be reforged into something greater.
Now I can be reforged again into something even greater.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_reached.armo: Through my reforging I have reached level %s!
Through my second reforging I have reached level %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_xp.fishing_r: Before I can advance further, we need to catch an enchanted book.
Before I can advance further, we need to catch a mending book.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_requirements: Now I can be reforged into something greater.
Now I can be reforged again into something even greater.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_reached.fish: Through my reforging I have reached level %s!
Through my second reforging I have reached level %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_xp.melee_wea: Before I can advance further, we need to kill something powerful.
Before I can advance further, we need to kill a boss.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_requirements: Now I can be reforged into something greater.
Now I can be reforged again into something even greater.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_reached.mele: Through my reforging I have reached level %s!
Through my second reforging I have reached level %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_xp.shield_t1: Before I can advance further, you need to block an attack so powerful it would usually kill you instantly.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_xp.shield_t2: Before I can advance further, you need to block an attack so powerful it would usually kill you twice over.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_requirements: Now I can be reforged into something greater.
Now I can be reforged again into something even greater.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.ml_reached.shie: Through my reforging I have reached level %s!
Through my second reforging I have reached level %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.levelup.any.laz: So much work just to get to level %s? I feel scammed.
You're really working me to the bone here. I'm already level %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.levelup.any.sch: Level %s... Our plans are one step closer to completion.
Level %s. This should be enough for the next step of our plan.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.levelup.any.arr: Haha! Level %s! Unawakened items could never compare to me.
Now that I'm Level %s, do you think I should make other items bow to me?
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.despawn.any.any: Don't just leave me lying around!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.despawn.any.sch: I can appreciate taking your time, but this is getting a bit excessive. Pick me up already.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.despawn.any.arr: How dare you leave me lying on the ground!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.despawn.any.mer: Some rest once in a while is nice too! Even if I'd rather not lie on the ground.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.mobpickup.any.a: Help! I've been picked up by a %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.mobpickup.any.i: Ahhh! Help! I'm being kidnapped by a %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.mobpickup.any.s: A %s is disrupting our plans by taking me hostage!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.mobpickup.any.a: A filthy %s has laid hands on me!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.dimchange.any.m: Oh great, we're going to the %s!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.dimchange.any.l: Can we stop traveling so much?
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.dimchange.any.s: And so the next step of our plans leads us to the %s.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.dimchange.any.a: This realm will learn of my greatness as well.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.mobtarget.any.a: A %s dares to lay eyes on usâ€½
A %s is attracted by my awesomeness!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.mobtarget.any.s: Our plans are about to be disrupted by a %s.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.tooluse.any.sch: This %s may become a cornerstone of our plans.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.toolmine.any.la: This is definitely too much work.
Why do we even need so much %s?
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.toolmine.any.sc: This %s may become a cornerstone of our plans.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.toolmine.any.ar: This %s gives way just like all the others in my presence.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.weaponattack.an: This %s too shall be slain by my might!
This %s won't stand in our way any longer.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.armorprotect.an: Something like this can't take me down!
Your premature demise would be an unnecessary complication.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.random.any.merr: I have a good feeling about this.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.random.any.arro: Don't always look down on other items just because I'm objectively better.
There aren't many worthy of handling my might, you should be proud!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.damaged.any.arr: Have you seen how damaged I am? Repair me at once!
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.damaged.any.laz: I'm low on durability. Well, this is what happens when you have me work so hard.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.damaged.any.ins: C-can you please repair me? I don't have much durability left.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.damaged.any.sch: I'd advise you to repair me.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.damaged.any.mer: I don't wanna be a downer, but I could really use some repairs.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.willdie.any.laz: If you use me even one more time, I'll break. This is what too much work does to me.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.willdie.any.sch: This is your last chance to repair me.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.willdie.any.mer: I'd REALLY appreciate being repaired right now. We can continue after.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.awaken.any.arro: My name is %s? A worthy name.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.awaken.any.sche: Hello, I suppose you're my new owner. My name is %s? I can work with that.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.awaken.any.merr: Hello! I hope the binding didn't hurt too much. I'm %s? What a great name you picked for me! I can already tell we'll get along well.
chat.awakeneditems.aimsg.awaken-noname.a: You didn't even name me? Preposterous!
Didn't care to name me? Well, I can relate.
H-hello, you didn't pick a name for me? T-that's fine, I guess.
Hello, I suppose you're my new owner. You have no name for me? I suppose I'll just be a %s. At least for now.
Hello! I hope the binding didn't hurt too much. Oh, you haven't picked a name for me! I'm sure together we can come up with something.
